page.title: 18TOURISM IN BADLUARACH
page.content: ALTHOUGH THE NORTH-WEST END OF LITTLE LOCH BROOM IS AN AREA OF NATURAL BEAUTY WITH SPECTACULAR VIEWS OF THE SEA,THE ISLANDS AND THE SURROUNDING MOUNTAINS,IT HAS NOT BEEN DEVELOPED AS A TOURIST CENTRE AND ITS APPEAL IS FOR THOSE SEEKING A QUIET HOLIDAY. IN BADLUARACH THERE IS ONE HOUSE OFFERING BED AND BREAKFAST, ONE HOLIDAY COTTAGE AND ONE CARAVAN FOR HIRE. BADLUARACH JETTY IS USED BY TOURISTS TO LAUNCH SMALL BOATS AND IS INCREASINGLY USED BY DIVERS,EITHER WITH INFLATABLE DINGHIES,OR DIRECTLY FROM THE JETTY.SOME DIVERS COLLECT SCALLOPS BUT MOST SIMPLY ENJOY LOOKING AT THE MARINE LIFE IN THE CLEAR WATER. BECAUSE THERE IS NO REALLY SHELTERED ANCHORAGE YACHTS RARELY VISIT LITTLE LOCH BROOM.THERE IS NO FRESHWATER FISHING HERE.SEA ANGLING IS ARRANGED.
